text: Blessy is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== It is a farming village some northwest of Béthune and west of Lille, at the junction of the D159 and D189 roads, with the A26 autoroute passing by less than half a mile away. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Omer, dating from the fifteenth century. * The remains of the chateau of Blessel. * A limestone quarry. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Blessy, Pas-de-Calais
